articles.author: Sean Conlon, Sarah Min
articles.title: S&P 500 rises to start a holiday-shortened week, led by tech: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Wall Street is coming off a mixed week for the major averages.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 rose on Monday, spurred by a rise in technology shares, to start a shortened holiday week.
The broad market index climbed 0.4%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average advanced 107 points, … [+1621 chars]
